RUN.alias: TODO: Submitter designated name for the 'Run'. The name must be unique within the submission account.
RUN.center_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the submitter's account
RUN.broker_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the broker if applicable, if not, remove this attribute (broker_name)
RUN.run_date: TODO: ISO date when the run took place (e.g. '2001-12-17T09:30:47Z'). If the time stamp is unknown, leave it as 0s (e.g. 2008-07-02T00:00:00)
RUN.run_center: TODO: If applicable, the name of the contract sequencing center that executed the run (e.g. 454MSC). Remove this attribute otherwise.
RUN.TITLE: TODO: Short text that can be used to define submissions in searches or in displays.

EXPERIMENT_REF.refname: TODO: Identifies the parent experiment (that encompasses this run) by name within the namespace defined by attribute 'refcenter'.
EXPERIMENT_REF.refcenter: TODO: Acronym of the center name used to submit the referenced experiment.

STANDARD.refname: TODO: Standard genome assembly name (e.g. GRCh37)
STANDARD.accession: TODO: Standard genome accession version (e.g. GCA_000001405.1)

SEQUENCE.accession: TODO: Accession of the sequence for the reference alignment in format 'Accession.version', with version being mandatory (e.g. CM000663.1)
SEQUENCE.label: TODO: How Reference Sequence is labeled in submission file(s) (e.g. chr1). It is equivalent to the @SQ label in a BAM file (optional when submitted file uses INSDC accession.version.

DATA_BLOCK.member_name: TODO: Optional name (alias) given in the experiment XML of a pooled experiment. Use exclusively with demultiplexed data, otherwise, remove this attribute (member_name)

FILE.filename: TODO: The name or relative pathname of a run data file (e.g. path/to/files/file.fastq)
FILE.filetype: TODO: The run data file model. Choose from Controlled vocabulary: 'sra', 'srf', 'sff', 'fastq', 'fasta', 'tab', '454_native', '454_native_seq', '454_native_qual', 'Helicos_native', 'Illumina_native', 'Illumina_native_seq', 'Illumina_native_prb', 'Illumina_native_int', 'Illumina_native_qseq', 'Illumina_native_scarf', 'SOLiD_native', 'SOLiD_native_csfasta', 'SOLiD_native_qual', 'PacBio_HDF5', 'bam', 'cram', 'CompleteGenomics_native', 'OxfordNanopore_native'
FILE.unencrypted_checksum: TODO: CHECKSUM from unencrypted file (e.g. e609bc52c035ff1a62cdba0f0689889j)
FILE.quality_scoring_system: TODO: How the input data are scored for quality (either 'phred' or 'log-odds').
FILE.quality_encoding: TODO: Character used in representing the minimum quality value (choose from 'ascii', 'decimal' or 'hexadecimal'). Helps specify how to decode text rendering of quality data.
FILE.ascii_offset: TODO: Character used in representing the minimum quality value (e.g. '!' or '@'). Helps specify how to decode text rendering of quality data.

RUN_ATTRIBUTE.TAG: TODO: Name of the custom attribute.
RUN_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Value of the custom attribute.
